name: Ruins of the Mage Guild
text: When this card is activated: Add 1 "Mage Guild" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can discard 1 Spellcaster monster; Special Summon 1 "Mage Guild" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. Your opponent cannot target "Mage Guild" monsters in your Main Monster Zone with card effects during Main Phase 1. If this card is destroyed: Set 1 "Mage Guild" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your Spell/Trap zone. You can only use each effect of "Ruins of the Mage Guild" once per turn.
